summary: Applied fixes: added purchaser_id column migration and factory field for beauty_gift_cards; added BeautyPackageUsageFactory; switched loyalty tests to is_active; ensured unique retail order user emails; expanded BookingFlowTest working hours. Migrate:fresh --seed succeeded. phpunit still failing: missing beauty_packages.total_sessions column, loyalty campaign type wallet_credit not allowed (enum), test calling private calculateCancellationFee, and other remaining failures (see latest phpunit log dec15934/792dc358). kluster review tool failed because repo not detected.
current_status: Beauty module tests still failing; key blockers: beauty_packages schema missing total_sessions/used_sessions, loyalty campaign type enum vs wallet_credit, private method call in BeautyBookingApiTest, additional errors in log.
